name: JavaRockstars
overview:
JavaRockStars was founded by a group of technology veterans with over 20 years experience each Our basic premise, is that professional Java coders Can code 2 to 4 X times faster and more efficiently than entry level coders.
Many studies have confirmed this
You probably would quickly agree you don’t go see a nurse for brain surgery. Why? Specialization, experience, and communication are critical to defining a “professional resource” – no matter what field of expertise.
JavaRockStars specializes in Java, and Java Related Technologies, period. Because we only focus on Java we spend 100% of our recruiting efforts day-in, day-out sourcing Java professionals - we save the time/effort of looking for a “Database Administrator” one day and “Java” expert the next day. We have the laser like focus we are experts in the Java field, and we only will hire similar expertise.
hiring…Java RockStars..!
